description: This file sets up an AI agent with a specific language model, storage backend, and tools, then queries it with two questions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, storage, and tools.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in a PostgreSQL database.

classes.name: LlamaOpenAI
classes.description: Represents the Llama OpenAI language model configuration.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent to a given prompt.
